org.svvrl.goal.core.io.dot
Class DotCodec

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.io.dot.DotCodec
All Implemented Interfaces:
Codec
public class DotCodec
extends java.lang.Object
implements Codec

This class provides a codec that can encode automata and games to the Graphviz Dot format.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
